files.name: .editorconfig
files.content:
root = true

[*]
charset = utf-8
end_of_line = lf
insert_final_newline = true
tab_width = 4
indent_style = space
indent_size = 2
trim_trailing_whitespace = true

[*.{py,md,mkd,markdown}]
indent_size = 4

[*.xml]
indent_style = tab

[*.{md,mkd,markdown}]
trim_trailing_whitespace = false

# python files without extension
[show-duplicate-java-classes]
indent_size = 4

files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
!bin/

#################################################
# Programming Language
#################################################

### Python template
# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]

# C extensions
*.so

# Distribution / packaging
.Python
env/
build/
develop-eggs/
dist/
downloads/
eggs/
.eggs/
lib/
lib64/
parts/
sdist/
var/
*.egg-info/
.installed.cfg
*.egg

# PyInstaller
#  Usually these files are written by a python script from a template
#  before PyInstaller builds the exe, so as to inject date/other infos into it.
*.manifest
*.spec

# Installer logs
pip-log.txt
pip-delete-this-directory.txt

# Unit test / coverage reports
htmlcov/
.tox/
.coverage
.coverage.*
.cache
nosetests.xml
coverage.xml
*,cover

# Translations
*.mo
*.pot

# Django stuff:
*.log

# Sphinx documentation
docs/_build/

.ipynb_checkpoints/

### Ruby template
*.gem
*.rbc
/.config
/coverage/
/InstalledFiles
/pkg/
/spec/reports/
/test/tmp/
/test/version_tmp/

## Specific to RubyMotion:
.dat*
.repl_history

## Documentation cache and generated files:
/.yardoc/
/_yardoc/
/doc/
/rdoc/

## Environment normalisation:
/.bundle/
/vendor/bundle
/lib/bundler/man/

# for a library or gem, you might want to ignore these files since the code is
# intended to run in multiple environments; otherwise, check them in:
# Gemfile.lock
# .ruby-version
# .ruby-gemset

# unless supporting rvm < 1.11.0 or doing something fancy, ignore this:
.rvmrc


### Node template
# Logs
logs

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed

# Directory for instrumented libs generated by jscoverage/JSCover
lib-cov

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage

# Grunt intermediate storage (http://gruntjs.com/creating-plugins#storing-task-files)
.grunt

# node-waf configuration
.lock-wscript

# Compiled binary addons (http://nodejs.org/api/addons.html)
build/Release

# Dependency directory
# https://www.npmjs.org/doc/misc/npm-faq.html#should-i-check-my-node_modules-folder-into-git
node_modules


#################################################
# IDE/Editor
#################################################

### JetBrains template
# Covers JetBrains IDEs: IntelliJ, RubyMine, PhpStorm, AppCode, PyCharm

*.iml

## Directory-based project format:
.idea/
# if you remove the above rule, at least ignore the following:

# User-specific stuff:
# .idea/workspace.xml
# .idea/tasks.xml
# .idea/dictionaries

# Sensitive or high-churn files:
# .idea/dataSources.ids
# .idea/dataSources.xml
# .idea/sqlDataSources.xml
# .idea/dynamic.xml
# .idea/uiDesigner.xml

# Gradle:
# .idea/gradle.xml
# .idea/libraries

# Mongo Explorer plugin:
# .idea/mongoSettings.xml

## File-based project format:
*.ipr
*.iws

## Plugin-specific files:

# IntelliJ
/out/

# mpeltonen/sbt-idea plugin
.idea_modules/

# JIRA plugin
atlassian-ide-plugin.xml

# Crashlytics plugin (for Android Studio and IntelliJ)
com_crashlytics_export_strings.xml
crashlytics.properties
crashlytics-build.properties


### Eclipse template
*.pydevproject
.metadata
.gradle
tmp/
*.bak
*.swp
*~.nib
.settings/
.loadpath

# Eclipse Core
.project

# External tool builders
.externalToolBuilders/

# Locally stored "Eclipse launch configurations"
*.launch

# CDT-specific
.cproject

# JDT-specific (Eclipse Java Development Tools)
.classpath

# PDT-specific
.buildpath

# sbteclipse plugin
.target

# TeXlipse plugin
.texlipse

.factorypath


### SublimeText template
# cache files for sublime text
*.tmlanguage.cache
*.tmPreferences.cache
*.stTheme.cache

# workspace files are user-specific
*.sublime-workspace

# project files should be checked into the repository, unless a significant
# proportion of contributors will probably not be using SublimeText
# *.sublime-project

# sftp configuration file
sftp-config.json


### Vim template
[._]*.s[a-w][a-z]
[._]s[a-w][a-z]
*.un~
Session.vim
.netrwhist
*~


### vs code
.vscode/


#################################################
# OS
#################################################

### OSX template
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Icon must end with two \r
Icon��


### Linux template
# KDE directory preferences
.directory

# Linux trash folder which might appear on any partition or disk
.Trash-*


### Windows template
# Windows image file caches
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
ehthumbs_vista.db

# Folder config file
Desktop.ini

# Recycle Bin used on file shares
$RECYCLE.BIN/

# Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Windows shortcuts
*.lnk

[ğŸš `Shell`ç›¸å…³è„šæœ¬](#-shell%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E8%84%9A%E6%9C%AC) - [ğŸ“ Developer Guide](#-developer-guide) - [ğŸ¯ é¢å‘å¼€å‘è€…çš„ç›®æ ‡](#-%E9%9D%A2%E5%90%91%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E8%80%85%E7%9A%84%E7%9B%AE%E6%A0%87) - [å…³äº`Shell`è„šæœ¬](#%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%8Eshell%E8%84%9A%E6%9C%AC) - [ğŸš¦ å¼€å‘çº¦å®š](#-%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E7%BA%A6%E5%AE%9A) - [ğŸ“š `Shell`å­¦ä¹ ä¸å¼€å‘çš„èµ„æ–™](#-shell%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0%E4%B8%8E%E5%BC%80%E5%8F%91%E7%9A%84%E8%B5%84%E6%96%99) ---------------------- ğŸ”° å¿«é€Ÿä¸‹è½½&ä½¿ç”¨ ---------------------- ```bash source <(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oldratlee/useful-scripts/release-3.x/test/self-installer.sh) ``` æ›´å¤šä¸‹è½½&ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå‚è§[ä¸‹è½½ä½¿ç”¨](docs/install.md)ã€‚ ğŸ“š ä½¿ç”¨æ–‡æ¡£ ---------------------- ### â˜• [`Java`ç›¸å…³è„šæœ¬](docs/java.md) 1. [show-busy-java-threads](docs/java.md#-show-busy-java-threads) ç”¨äºå¿«é€Ÿæ’æŸ¥`Java`çš„`CPU`æ€§èƒ½é—®é¢˜(`top us`å€¼è¿‡é«˜)ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨æŸ¥å‡ºè¿è¡Œçš„`Java`è¿›ç¨‹ä¸­æ¶ˆè€—`CPU`å¤šçš„çº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå¹¶æ‰“å°å‡ºå…¶çº¿ç¨‹æ ˆï¼Œä»è€Œç¡®å®šå¯¼è‡´æ€§èƒ½é—®é¢˜çš„æ–¹æ³•è°ƒç”¨ã€‚ 1. [show-duplicate-java-classes](docs/java.md#-show-duplicate-java-classes) æ‰¾å‡º`jar`æ–‡ä»¶å’Œ`class`ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„é‡å¤ç±»ã€‚ç”¨äºæ’æŸ¥`Java`ç±»å†²çªé—®é¢˜ã€‚ 1. [find-in-jars](docs/java.md#-find-in-jars) åœ¨ç›®å½•ä¸‹æ‰€æœ‰`jar`æ–‡ä»¶é‡Œï¼ŒæŸ¥æ‰¾ç±»æˆ–èµ„æºæ–‡ä»¶ã€‚ ### ğŸš [`Shell`ç›¸å…³è„šæœ¬](docs/shell.md) `Shell`ä½¿ç”¨åŠ å¼ºï¼š 1. [c](docs/shell.md#-c) åŸæ ·å‘½ä»¤è¡Œè¾“å‡ºï¼Œå¹¶æ‹·è´æ ‡å‡†è¾“å‡ºåˆ°ç³»ç»Ÿå‰ªè´´æ¿ï¼Œçœå»`CTRL+C`æ“ä½œï¼Œä¼˜åŒ–å‘½ä»¤è¡Œä¸å…¶å®ƒåº”ç”¨ä¹‹é—´çš„æ“ä½œæµã€‚ 1. [coat and taoc](docs/shell.md#-coat) å½©è‰²`cat`/`tac`å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶è¡Œï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿äººçœ¼åŒºåˆ†ä¸åŒçš„è¡Œã€‚ 1. [a2l](docs/shell.md#-a2l) æŒ‰è¡Œå½©è‰²è¾“å‡ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œæ–¹ä¾¿äººçœ¼æŸ¥çœ‹ã€‚ 1. [uq](docs/shell.md#-uq) ä¸é‡æ’åºè¾“å…¥å®Œæˆæ•´ä¸ªè¾“å…¥è¡Œçš„å»é‡ã€‚ç›¸æ¯”ç³»ç»Ÿçš„`uniq`å‘½ä»¤åŠ å¼ºçš„æ˜¯å¯ä»¥è·¨è¡Œå»é‡ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦æ’åºè¾“å…¥ã€‚ 1. [ap and rp](docs/shell.md#-ap-and-rp) æ‰¹é‡è½¬æ¢æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ä¸ºç»å¯¹è·¯å¾„/ç›¸å¯¹è·¯å¾„ï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è·Ÿè¸ªé“¾æ¥å¹¶è§„èŒƒåŒ–è·¯å¾„ã€‚ 1. [cp-into-docker-run](docs/shell.md#-cp-into-docker-run) ä¸€ä¸ª`Docker`ä½¿ç”¨çš„ä¾¿åˆ©è„šæœ¬ã€‚æ‹·è´æœ¬æœºçš„æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶åˆ°æŒ‡å®šçš„`docker container`ä¸­å¹¶åœ¨`docker container`ä¸­æ‰§è¡Œã€‚ 1. [tcp-connection-state-counter](docs/shell.md#-tcp-connection-state-counter) ç»Ÿè®¡å„ä¸ª`TCP`è¿æ¥çŠ¶æ€çš„ä¸ªæ•°ã€‚ç”¨äºæ–¹ä¾¿æ’æŸ¥ç³»ç»Ÿè¿æ¥è´Ÿè·é—®é¢˜ã€‚ 1. [xpl and xpf](docs/shell.md#-xpl-and-xpf) åœ¨å‘½ä»¤è¡Œä¸­å¿«é€Ÿå®Œæˆ åœ¨æ–‡ä»¶æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸­ æ‰“å¼€/é€‰ä¸­ æŒ‡å®šçš„æ–‡ä»¶æˆ–æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œä¼˜åŒ–å‘½ä»¤è¡Œä¸å…¶å®ƒåº”ç”¨ä¹‹é—´çš„æ“ä½œæµã€‚ `Shell`å¼€å‘/æµ‹è¯•åŠ å¼ºï¼š 1.
